summary: This Mod adds up to 20+ more followers to the world of skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
=========================================================================================
Description

This Mod is going to add up to 20 or more followers to the game. Some of which are unique and interesting. So far there is no quests or anything for them to follow you, I might end up adding some quests so they will follow you but for now you just ask them to follow you and they will. So far there are only 10 followers that i have added but i will be putting more into the game soon.

=========================================================================================
Warning :

This Mod requires the ApachiiSkyHair Mod created by apachii
Link --->  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168

=========================================================================================
Locations :

- Skeemeet - Riften Ragged Flagon
- Mabrel - Dark Brotherhood Sanctuary
- Aergai - Solitude Blue Palace
- Sabinu Pevengius - Solitude Blue Palace Courtyard
- Antoni Valius - Solitude Castle Dour District
- Rostei - Solitude Market
- Viguri - Whiterun Bannered Mare
- Altair - Whiterun Drunken Huntsman
- The Lonely Beggar - Whiterun Plains District
- Shabhira - Riften Origin 
- Haakig - Windhelm Bridge
- Bormir - Vandle Hearth Hall / Windhelm Inn

=========================================================================================
Credits : 
I would like to thank Apachii for his ApachiiSkyHair Mod which gave some of the followers in this mod to look different and unique compared to the normal followers of skyrim.

=========================================================================================
Bugs :
All the followers have the same voice and i will be fixing this soon.

=========================================================================================
Install/Uninstall :
I recommend using the Nexus Mod Manager its very easy to use.
If not then download this file and move the files in this download to your data files in your Skyrim directory or delete them to uninstall.

=========================================================================================
Check out my other mods
- Riverwood Hilltop Manor - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25447
author: Bradaxx
